page.title: 05Education
page.content: One state infant/primary school at Lt Bealings. Children taken there buy bus from surrounding villages and farms. children go to Woodride, Ipswich or kesgrave for secondary eductions, state or private. Sixth-form college is in Ipswich, A-level exams are taken there (or at Suffolk college, Ipswich, for technical education) or at Woodbridge School (an independent establishment). A private finishing school in Plyford, Bransons College which has branches in Canada and England, takes boys and girls to A-level examinations. At kesgrave Hall there is a private residential school or maladjusted boys whe remedial care is given and the boys have a high stadard of education. Playgroups for pre-school children held at Rushmere Baptish Church on weekdays morings.
